name: Polygon Wars (the_Shreyans)
description:
Can you survive 3 minutes of Polygons gone rogue?

Shoot your way through the polygons in this extremely competitive neon action game.

This is Arcade Reimagined.

Features:

  • Simple controls and UI
  • Beautiful minimal graphics with a unique soundtrack by OZZED
  • Challenging Enemies that truly test your skills
  • No unnecessary confusing game clutter
  • Just unlimited fun!
